definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: Their testimony and cross-examination were uneventful.
sentences.chinese: 他们的作证和盘问是平淡无事的。

sentences.english: But, leaving buy interrogate and arrest to be passed on property is different.
sentences.chinese: 但是，留置盘问与拘传在性质上是不同的。

sentences.english: All of the boys, without exception, were cross-examined.
sentences.chinese: 所有的男孩子无一例外地都受到盘问。

sentences.english: He was grilled for two hours before the police let him go.
sentences.chinese: 警察严厉地盘问了他两小时，才放他走。

sentences.english: E. g. I was cross-examined over the breakfast table.
sentences.chinese: 我在早餐桌上被反复盘问。

sentences.english: It was he, the intruder, who interrogated.
sentences.chinese: 他是不速之客，反而盘问个不停。

sentences.english: The suspect was subjected to cross-examination at the police station.
sentences.chinese: 嫌疑犯在警察局受到盘问。

sentences.english: Terry Martin's cross-examination on the team, make things clear gradually.
sentences.chinese: 泰瑞对组员玛汀的盘问，使事情渐渐明了。

sentences.english: He'd anticipated a grilling, and had a map ready to show her.
sentences.chinese: 他以为会遭到什么盘问，于是准备了一张地图来应对。

sentences.english: It's time for the witness to take the stand for cross-examination.
sentences.chinese: 是证人上证人席接受盘问的时候了。

sentences.english: The questions of the driver had the tone of a subtle examination .
sentences.chinese: 司机的问话都含有盘问的口吻。

sentences.english: The interrogatory seemed to strike the honest magistrate all of a heAP.
sentences.chinese: 这场盘问似乎叫那正直的地方法官惊慌失措了。

sentences.english: If the person interrogated refuses to sign his name or press down his fingerprint, it shall be indicated in the notes.
sentences.chinese: 对被盘问人拒绝签名和捺指印的，应当在笔录上注明。

sentences.english: Teoh Beng Hock was found dead after one such questioning process.
sentences.chinese: 赵明福正是在其中一个盘问过程中死亡。

sentences.english: But after questioning Trevi, police said they could not be sure.
sentences.chinese: 但在对特列维进行盘问之后，警方却犯了糊涂。

sentences.english: And you cross-examined me for an hour.
sentences.chinese: 然后你仔细盘问了我一个小时。

definition: to question intensely/to interrogate/to demand information
to do a body search/to frisk
to beat a prisoner (to obtain confessions)/to give sb the third degree/to torture
